Name: Call me back
Description: Send a call me back message to any MTN Cameroon number

Name: ME2U (credit transfer)
Description: This will transfer airtime from your main balance to another MTN Cameroon number

Name: Main balance
Description: Show your main account balance and optionally your Mtn 4 me balance.

Name: My number
Description: Display your phone number and your current tariff plan.

Name: MTN services
Description: Display all Mtn cameroon services.

Name: MTN mobile money
Description: Display MTN mobile money menu.

Name: MTN Extensions(borrow credit)
Description: Borrow airtime(credit).

Name: MTN Extensions balance
Description: Borrow airtime(credit).

Name: Add a favourite number
Description: Add a number as favourite number.

Name: Delete a favourite number
Description: Borrow airtime(credit).

Name: Enable MTN Easy Booster
Description: Enable mtn easy booster.

Name: Disable MTN Easy Booster
Description: Disable mtn easy booster.

Name: MTN Easy Booster balance
Description: Display mtn easy booster balance.

Name: SMS package day(Unlimited text on the Go)
Description: Subscribe to mtn unlimited text on the Go. You will be charged 20 Frs/day

Name: SMS package month
Description: Subscribe to mtn monthly text. You will be charged 500 Frs

Name: SMS package validity
Description: Check the validy of an sms package

Name: MTN 4 Me
Description: Subscribe to MTN 4 me package

Name: MTN Go plans
Description: Subscribe to MTN Go plans package

Name: MTN Go plans balance
Description: Check MTN Go plans package balance

Name: MTN Mobile Money bonus(Credit purchase)

Description: Check MTN Mobile money bonus

Name: Calls bonuses

Name: MTN Play
Description: MTN play pakages

Name: Internet bundle subscription
Description: Subscribe to an internet bundle

Name: Internet bundle balance
Description: Display your internet bundle balance.

Name: Mobile Surf Day 100
Description: Subscribe to data package day. 100Frs = 75Mo (valid for 24H)

Name: Mobile Surf Day 250
Description: Subscribe to data package day. 250Frs = 200Mo (valid for 24H)

Name: Mobile Surf Day 500
Description: Subscribe to data package day. 500Frs = 450Mo (valid for 24H)

Name: Mobile Surf Week 1000
Description: Subscribe to data package week. 1000Frs = 500Mo (valid for 7 Days)

Name: Mobile Surf Week 3000
Description: Subscribe to data package week. 3000Frs = 2.5Go (valid for 7 Days)

Name: Mobile Surf Month 2000
Description: Subscribe to data package month. 2000Frs = 600Mo (valid for 30 Days)

Name: Mobile Streaming 40000
Description: Subscribe to data package streaming. 40000Frs = 75Go (valid for 30 Days)

Name: Mobile Surf Night 500
Description: Subscribe to data package night. 500Frs = 1Go (valid from Midnight to 06H)

Name: Mobile Surf 50
Description: Subscribe to data package 50. 50Frs = 50Mo (valid for 02H)

Name: Mobile Surf Day 100 Gift
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 100Frs = 75Mo (valid for 24H)

Name: Mobile Surf Day 250 Gift
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 250Frs = 200Mo (valid for 24H)

Name: Mobile Surf Day 500 Gift
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 500Frs = 450Mo (valid for 24H)

Name: Mobile Surf Week 1000 Gift
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 1000Frs = 500Mo (valid for 7 Days)

Name: Mobile Surf Week 3000
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 3000Frs = 2.5Go (valid for 7 Days)

Name: Mobile Surf Month 2000 Gift
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 2000Frs = 600Mo (valid for 30 Days)

Name: Mobile Streaming 40000 Gift
Description: Give out a data package to an MTN Cameroon subscriber. 40000Frs = 75Go (valid for 30 Days)

Name: MTN Sky
Description: MTN Sky is MTN Cameroons VIP tariff plan. Here calls are taxed at 1 F/s to all MTN numbers and at 0.5F after a daily consumption of 100F.

Name: WhatsApp Day
Description: Subscribe to MTN WhatsApp Daily data bundle. This will cost you 200Frs (valid for 1 day)

Name: WhatsApp Week
Description: Subscribe to MTN WhatsApp Weekly data bundle. This will cost you 500Frs (valid for 7 days)

Name: WhatsApp On The Go
Description: Subscribe to MTN WhatsApp On The Go data bundle. This will cost you 20Frs/Day

Name: WhatsApp Month
Description: Subscribe to MTN WhatsApp Monthly data bundle. This will cost you 1500Frs(valid for 30 days)

Name: WhatsApp data bundle balance
Description: Check WhatsApp data bundle balance
